mapper.insert: insert into filetemplate (fileId, fileName, projectType, fileUrl, `enable`) values (#{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projecttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select fileId, fileName, projectType, fileUrl, `enable` from filetemplate
